ucl.pdd.api.Aggregation.title: Aggregation
ucl.pdd.api.Aggregation.description: An aggregation is a request to collect searches during a given time period as part of a campaign. Each campaign is divided in several aggregations, usually one per day. An aggregation is created only when it is open, i.e., it accepts clients sending their sketches, which is at least after its `endTime`.

attrs.description: Attributes of this aggregation. Cannot be modified after creation.

delay.description: Delay after which the aggregation is made available.

startTime.description: Time at which this campaign starts.

email.description: E-mail addresses associated with this campaign. They are not publicly displayed to the users but receive notifications sent by the system.

description.description: Description of this campaign, explaining to the users its purpose. Markdown is allowed.

vocabulary.description: Last version of the vocabulary tracked by this campaign. We do not keep a history of the vocabularies here, this is implicitly tracked by the various aggregations created as part of this campaign.

rawStrategy.description: Configuration of the raw data collection strategy. If absent, it is disabled.

endTime.description: Time at which this campaign completes. After this time, no new aggregations will be generated for this campaign, but currently active aggregations will remain active for at most `delay` + `graceDelay`. It can be left empty for an open-ended campaign.

privacyStrategy.description: Configuration of the privacy-preserving data collection strategy. If absent,it is disabled.

activeQueries.description: Bitmap of whether each query of the vocabulary is active.

graceDelay.description: Additional delay during which the sketches are still accepted, thus allowing the aggregation to be refined. This delay starts after the initial `delay` is expired.

activeTime.description: Time at which the client last pinged the server.

leaveTime.description: Time at which the client left the campaign. Shall he choose to come back, he will be considered as a new client.

decryptTime.description: Time at which the sketch was decrypted. All sketches of a given group are decrypted at once, but since we do not have objects for group this information is denormalized here.

recoveryFactors.description: Recovery factors sent by this client, if any. There is one recovery factor per active query of interest, inactive queries are not included.

submitTime.description: Time at which the sketch was submitted.

values.description: Aggregated counts sent by this client, if any. There is one count per active queries of interest, inactive queries are not included.

recoveryTime.description: Time at which the recovery factors were submitted.

enabled.description: Whether the collection of raw counts is enabled.

ucl.pdd.api.Campaign.title: Campaign
ucl.pdd.api.Campaign.description: A campaign corresponds to a vocabulary tracked during a given period of time. Clients join individual campaigns in order to contribute with their searches.

ucl.pdd.api.Vocabulary.description: A vocabulary is a list of search queries that are tracked. A vocabulary is append-only, queries cannot be removed once they have been added to enforce traceability.

queries.description: List of search queries tracked by this vocabulary.

offset.description: In case this object represent a partial view over a vocabulary, indicates how many items where skipped. Useful when sending delta updates.

ucl.pdd.api.Sketch.title: Sketch
ucl.pdd.api.Sketch.description: A sketch is an individual request to collect searches during a given time period concerning a given client. Sketches are created at the same moment than aggregations, and (hopefully) filled when clients send their sketches. Sketches should expected to be garbage collected once an aggregation is expired.

decryptedCount.description: Number of users whose sketches have been successfully decrypted.

values.description: Aggregated query counts. There should be the same number of elements here than `activeQueries`. Inactive terms are not represented.

pendingCount.description: Number of users whose sketches are received but still pending decryption.

updateTime.description: Last time at which this status was updated.

campaignName.description: The name of the campaign this client is part of. Cannot be modified.

externalName.description: A name voluntarily filled by the user allowing to identify him across services. For example, we can ask paid volunteers to give us their name/identifier so that we can ensure that they indeed contributed to our tests.

ucl.pdd.api.VocabularyQuery.description: A query of interest inside a vocabulary. Exactly one of the fields should be set.

exact.description: An exact query represent an entire search query.

terms.description: Terms represent a list of tokens that must be simultaneously present in a search query. The order does not matter (as opposed to n-grams).

expireTime.description: Time at which the aggregation closes, i.e., it does not accept sketches anymore. This corresponds to `readyTime` + campaign's `graceDelay`. Therefore, it may be equal to `readyTime` if there is no additional configured in the campaign. There are no open-ended aggregations.

startTime.description: Start time of collection period, i.e., collected searches should be made after this time.

clientsCount.description: Number of clients that were registered in the campaign during the collection period of this aggregation.

collectEncrypted.description: Whether the encrypted counts are collected. Encrypted counts are collected if a privacy-preserving strategy has been configured in the campaign.

endTime.description: End time of collection period, i.e., collected searches should be made before this time.

collectRaw.description: Whether the raw counts are collected. Raw counts are collected if a raw strategy has been configured in the campaign.

campaignName.description: The name of the campaign this aggregation is part of.

readyTime.description: Time at which the aggregation will be published. It does not mean that it will be complete at this date (it may never be...), but it will nonetheless be released. This corresponds to `endTime` + campaign's `delay`.

activeQueries.description: Bitmap of whether each query of the vocabulary is active.

activeCount.description: Number of clients that were active during the collection period of this aggregation.

enabled.description: Whether the collection of encrypted counts is enabled.

groupSize.description: Expected group size. It is a hint for the group forming strategy as what the size of a group should be. In practice, it is an upper bound.

minGroupSize.description: Minimum allowed group size. In practice, it is a lower bound, with most groups of size `groupSize`, while some of them may be smaller.

ucl.colossus.api.ObjectMeta.description: Standard metadata attached to all API resources.

name.description: Object name, that must be unique within a namespace. Is required when creating resources, although some resources may allow a client to request the generation of an appropriate name automatically. Cannot be updated.

createTime.description: Time at which this object was created. Populated by the system & read-only.

annotations.description: Key/value map that may be set by external tools to store and retrieve arbitrary metadata. They are not queryable. Not modifiable.

labels.description: Key/value map that can be used to organize and categorize (scope and select) objects. May be matched by selectors.

uid.description: UID is the unique in time and space value for this object. It is typically generated by the server on successful creation of a resource. Populated by the system & read-only.

namespace.description: Namespace defines the space within each name must be unique. An empty namespace is equivalent to the "default" namespace, but "default" is the canonical representation. Not all objects are required to be scoped to a namespace - the value of this field for those objects will be empty. Cannot be updated.

clientName.description: The name of the client this sketch is about. Cannot be modified.

aggregationName.description: The name of the aggregation this sketch is part of. Cannot be modified.

groupName.description: The identifier of the group the client is part of for this sketch, even though groups do not have a proper identity for now (i.e., they do not have their own API resource). Cannot be modified.

clientIndex.description: Position of the client inside his group.

ucl.pdd.api.SubmitSketchCommand.description: A request to send counts for a given sketch.

startTime.description: Start time of collection period, i.e., collected searches should be made after this time.

vocabulary.description: A delta update appending new queries to the local version of the vocabulary the client is aware of. It is empty if the client is up-to-date.

endTime.description: End time of collection period, i.e., collected searches should be made before this time.

groupKeys.description: List of public keys of the other members of the group. It does *not* include the current client's key.

activeQueries.description: Bitmap of whether each query of the vocabulary is active.

commands.description: A list of command that the client should execute.

nextPingTime.description: Next time at which the client should ping the server.

ucl.pdd.api.SubmitRecoveryCommand.description: A command to submit recovery factors for a given sketch.

missingKeys.description: List of public keys of the members of the group that were not able to send their sketch.

code.description: Suggested HTTP return code for this error.

reason.description: A short, machine-readable description of this error. It clarifies the error code but does not override it.

message.description: A human-readable description of this error.

details.description: Extended data associated with the reason.

kind.description: Kind of the resource in fault, if any.

name.description: Name of the object in fault, if any.

causes.description: List of causes that triggered this error.
